name.en: Topics in Mathematical Image Processing Ⅰ

goal.en: This is a companion course of the「MA3111 An Introduction to Mathematical Image Processing」. We will emphasize practical implementation and computer simulations. Based on knowledge taught in 「MA3111 An Introduction to Mathematical Image Processing」, each student will finish a large research project by the end of the semester and present it with a report and live demonstration. Hopefully students will gain hands on experience to apply theories, develop abilities of independent research, and get a sense of what academic research is about.
goal.ch: 本課程是「MA3111數學影像處理」的配套課程，我們將強調實際實施和電腦模擬，以「MA3111數學影像處理」中教授的知識為基礎，每位學生會用整個學期的時間完成一項大的專題研究，並且在最後以書面報告佐以現場展示呈現。期望藉此可以增進學生實作和應用理論的能力，同時培養獨立研究思考的素養，進而一窺學術研究的樣貌。

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. How to search for and read papers
3. Image compression
4. What is plagiarism
5. Academic writing

textbook.en: No textbook, but we will provide some slides and journal papers. Below are some references: (1) R. C. Gonzalez and R. E. Woods, Digital Image Processing, Fourth Edition, Pearson Education Limited, New York, 2018.
textbook.ch: 無指定課本，主要為自編教材投影片及部份專業期刊論文。 其他參考書： (1) R. C. Gonzalez and R. E. Woods, Digital Image Processing, Fourth Edition, Pearson Education Limited, New York, 2018.
